phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
I am sure you are listening to this message, after I caused you so much trouble.
Please tell Rit-chan I am sorry.
And there is one more thing to trouble you with.
I would appreciate it if you could water them for me.
Katsuragi, the truth is with you.
If I can see you again, I will say the words that I could not say 8 years ago.
A telephone that does not ring...
ON BUSINESS Sorry, but do not call me
Misato-san's shutting herself up today, as usual.
If you enter without my permission, you shall die!
Asuka... she is not coming back?
She does not go to school or home, she just plays games all day.
I am causing you a lot of trouble.
I will never pilot an Eva again.
Now, it is not worth living.
I lost all my values for everything.
Though I hate myself the most.
Now I do not care about anything.
I think you can do anything you want to.
I really think you have done well.
Mm, I will come home when I have time to.
I have not been to my mom's grave in three years.
Next time, I will call you.
It is impossible for us to retrieve the Lance of Longinus.
And about the Eva series, we do not have all of them scheduled.
The annihilation of the Angel was more important.
Your excuses should be more persuasive.
The things you have done recently are too bold.
An Angel is approaching right now.
We will finish this discussion at the next opportunity.
That is, if your chair remains.
Ikari, are you going to betray us, SEELE?
I will be there in 15 minutes.
No, I do not have the right to cancel Commander Ikari's freeze on Unit 01.
Unit 02, wait at your present position.
At least it might be useful as a decoy.
I am on board again, as usual.
Am I still synched to this?
As soon as a location is designated, we will launch.
Even if I sortie, all I can do is disturb the others.
Target's approaching and is past the Gora Final Interception Line.
I do not care about anything, anymore.
Target is rotating in the air over Owakidani valley.
Target's AT Field is still active.
I do not have an excuse.
Changing cyclically from pattern blue to orange.
The MAGI are still working on the answer.
The data is insufficient to find an answer.
But I am sure that shape is not fixed.
Rei, we will observe its status for a while.
The Angel is trying to achieve first level contact with Unit 00?
Have her rescue Rei and provide cover.
Asuka, advance 300 meters and spread your AT Field,
then fire the palette gun at the Target's back.
Like this, she will be a victim too.
No, I feel someone else other than me.
A being that we call an Angel?
Do not you want to be unified with me?
I give you part of my mind.
We are many, but you are alone.
You hate it, do not you?
It is me who is crying?
The freeze on Unit 01 is canceled, effective immediately.
Am I so worthless to you?
You did not do this for me.
It hurts, does not it Ikari-kun?
The core cannot hold up much longer!
If I escape, the AT Field will disappear.
Rei, do you want to die?
The core is collapsing, critical pressure exceeded!
Rescue the pilot as soon as possible.
You mean, if there still is one.
Still unable to find the constituent matter for section 16.
At last we have defeated the Angels, up to the 16th.
Now there is only one Angel left, which is described in the Dead Sea Scrolls of Seele.
The road has been long, with many casualties.
After losing the Lance of Longinus, we lost Eva Unit 00.
That is sufficient reason to dismiss Ikari.
He must understand why we returned Fuyutsuki alive.
We have to find another pawn to use against Ikari.
And this one must know the truth.
Misato-san, the tears will not come.
I think I am sad, but tears never come.
Shinji-kun, all I can do for you is this.
I am sure he is feeling lonely.
No, he is just afraid of affection in general.
I am the one who is lonely.
It is me who is lonely.
The product of my despair, and yet the object of your hope.
I guess it is impossible to forget her.
Dr. Odani of the First Internal Department...
Dr. Odani, please contact the second conference room immediately.
2nd Floor Hospital Ward Radiation Diagnosis X-ray Reception
I am glad, you are alive!
But, my father is not here?
You saved me, by sacrifying Unit 00.
No... I mean, I do not know.
I think, probably, I am the third.
I am seeing this for the first time, but it feels familiar.
Preserve the present status for the First Children.
This applies to the Second and Third as well.
If they find out Rei is alive, Chairman Keel and the others will cause trouble.
I will present something else to the old men of SEELE.
We do not wish you to suffer from insults anymore.
I do not feel any insult.
I can see why Ikari wants to keep her next to him.
However, it was none other than Ikari who presented you to us.
Rejecting the interrogation of the pilot of Unit 00,
he presented you as her replacement, Doctor Akagi.
I am Rei's substitute, am I?
ON BUSINESS Sorry, but do not call me
The way to the truth which you wanted, was sent to you by 36 other methods.
But those will not reach you.
The only one guaranteed is this capsule.
It is completely up to you how to use this.
The pass code is our first memory.
I am not upset anymore by the telephone that does not ring...
Are you sure about releasing Doctor Akagi?
It will be beneficial to release her.
She rendered remarkable service to the Eva series.
She should be useful to us for a while.
Yes, for the future of humanity.
Regarding Evangelions, eight of them are under construction.
So, there are four more to go.
The disappearance of Tokyo-3 will enhance the project.
The promised day will be that day.
You are free from the secret service right now.
The secret of this place must be revealed before my eyes.
But this one will see it as well.
This looks just like Ayanami's room.
This is the place where she was born.
Light and water, which make up Rei's deep mentality, reflect the image of this place.
Dr. Akagi, I did not come to see this.
This is also the place where your mother disappeared.
You probably do not remember but you were watching it,
watching the moment when your mother disappeared.
You say this is the core of the dummy plug?
I will show you the truth.
These are about to be the core of the dummy system.
This is the factory for manufacturing them.
And nothing but spare parts for Rei.
Humans found a god, and thus tried to obtain it.
As a result, humanity was punished!
The god that they found vanished.
However, Man tried to resurrect God with his own hands,
From Adam, man created what resembles God.
Eva, which originally did not have a soul, now has a human soul.
However the vessel which truly contains a soul is Rei.
None of the other vessels have a soul.
There was nothing within the room of Gauf.
So I will destroy them, because I hate them.
Do you know what you are doing?!
These are not human, but human-shaped things.
When he is in my mind, I can bear any insult.
I do not care about my own body.
I... I am as stupid as my mother.
You can kill me, if you wish.
I would be glad if you did.
You are truly stupid if you wish that.
This is the tragedy of people possessed by Eva.
I am also one of them.
The city that the boy had been protecting disappears.
The friends that the boy had been close to leave.
The girls that the boy had been drawn to turn to fear.
Shinji has lost all his emotional supports,
but a new boy smiles upon him in the dusk.
Shinji gives himself over to the smile
that seems to envelop all the sins he has ever committed.
But a cruel fate was in store for them.
